section.p: The Allergies and Other Adverse Reactions Section contains data on the substance intolerances and the associated adverse reactions suffered by the patient. At a minimum, currently active and any relevant historical allergies and adverse reactions shall be listed.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Allergies Reactions Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.13) (C83-[CT-102-2])

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Allergy Drug Sensitivity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.6)
SHALL conform to CCD Alerts Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.2)
SHALL conform to IHE Allergies Reactions Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.13)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-258, CONF-259)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF-256), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Allergy Drug Sensitivity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.6)

SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing "alert" and/or "allergies and adverse reactions". (CONF-261)
[OCL]: self.title = 'alert' or self.title='allergies and adverse reactions'
The absence of known allergies, adverse reactions or alerts SHALL be explicitly asserted.
